Hey, Anna, what are your favorite handbags for spring?
To be honest, I rarely wear a handbag...
...but I am told by my team here at Vogue...
...that it's all about the crossbody handbag...
...which makes a lot of sense to me because it's practical, hands-free.
You can bicycle around Manhattan and enjoy in Central Park.
And they also come in every shape, size, fabrication.
So, that would be my tip for the season.
